text: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

translation.en: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers
translation.id: Sungguh, "sebenarnya keterangan-keterangan-Ku telah datang kepadamu, tetapi kamu mendustakannya, malah kamu menyombongkan diri dan termasuk orang kafir
